item.title: CVE-2021-32537|2024-09-17T00:50:35.243Z -- realtek -- hda%20driver
item.description: Realtek HAD contains a driver crashed vulnerability which allows local side attackers to send a special string to the kernel driver in a userâ€™s mode. Due to unexpected commands, the kernel driver will cause the system crashed.
